nodes.text: The 224th Recon Patrol Squad was a reconnaissance unit of the Corellian Security Force.

In 1 ABY, one of the unit's soldiers went missing after a wilderness survival exercise. A transponder check showed that he was still stuck out in the Corellian wilderness, with a broken leg and many hungry animals gathering. Because the unit was due to be shipped offworld soon, their Imperial Intelligence liaison remained uncaring who would be left behind. But as the 224th had always worked from the principle of leaving no one behind, they went outside the usual channels to rescue their comrade, hiring an experienced hunter to dispose of the animals while one member of the 224th did the rescue work.

The 224th Recon Patrol Squad was mentioned in the description of a mission called "Rescue Recon Buddy from Animals" in Star Wars Galaxies, that was available to players at Mission Terminals on Corellia.
